Package br.ufsc.labsec.signature.signer.ServletStorage

Class CommonSignerRequestInformation

java.lang.Object
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.signer.ServletStorage.CommonSignerRequestInformation
All Implemented Interfaces:
SignerRequestInformation
public class CommonSignerRequestInformation extends Object implements SignerRequestInformation
Esta classe reune os dados a serem utilizados para assinatura. Utilizada para auxiliar nos testes do Assinador
